Package edu.biu.scapi.interactiveMidProtocols.commitmentScheme.elGamal

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CmtElGamalCommitmentMessage
    Concrete implementation of commitment message used by ElGamal commitment scheme.
    CmtElGamalCommitmentPhaseValues
    This class holds the values used by the ElGamal Committer during the commitment phase for a specific value that the committer commits about.
    CmtElGamalCommitterCore
    This abstract class performs all the core functionality of the committer side of ElGamal commitment.
    CmtElGamalDecommitmentMessage
    Concrete implementation of decommitment message used by ElGamal commitment scheme.
    CmtElGamalOnByteArrayCommitter
    This class implements the committer side of the ElGamal commitment.
    CmtElGamalOnByteArrayReceiver
    This class implements the receiver side of the ElGamal commitment.
    CmtElGamalOnGroupElementCommitter
    This class implements the committer side of the ElGamal commitment.
    CmtElGamalOnGroupElementReceiver
    This class implements the receiver side of the ElGamal commitment.
    CmtElGamalReceiverCore
    This abstract class performs all the core functionality of the receiver side of ElGamal commitment.
    CmtElGamalWithProofsCommitter
    Concrete implementation of committer with proofs.
    CmtElGamalWithProofsReceiver
    Concrete implementation of receiver with proofs.
